Observation.Title,Test Pearson Correlation,String,Dimensionless,The title for the Chart

Observation.Axis.Label.X,X increment,String,Dimensionless,The X axis
Observation.Axis.Label.Y.0,Y value,String,Dimensionless,The Y axis

Observation.Channel.Count,4,DecimalInteger,Dimensionless,The number of data channels

Observation.Channel.Name.Temperature,Temperature,String,Dimensionless,The name of the Temperature Channel
Observation.Channel.Description.Temperature,The Temperature Channel,String,Dimensionless,The description of the Temperature Channel
Observation.Channel.DataType.Temperature,DecimalInteger,String,Dimensionless,The DataType of the Temperature Channel
Observation.Channel.Units.Temperature,Celsius,String,Dimensionless,The Units of the Temperature Channel
Observation.Channel.Colour.Temperature,r=255 g=000 b=000,ColourData,Dimensionless,The Colour of the Temperature Channel graph
